summary: Professional earning platform 'MHS Online Earn Platform' (formerly 'MHS★Online Earn Platform') with user registration, daily task system (10+ tasks), referral tracking with unique links, secure admin panel for user/task management, navigation menu (Home, Job Task, Withdraw, Refer & Earn, Payment Proof, Support), Facebook integration for support, dedicated Job Task page with timer functionality, and mobile-optimized hamburger menu. Registration backend fully functional with live registration recording.
architectural_notes: Use simple local authentication for admin panel - no Internet Identity or external redirects
Blue and white color theme throughout the platform
Implement hamburger menu for mobile navigation
Replace WhatsApp integration with Facebook profile link throughout
Add timer functionality (10 seconds) for job task completion
Use uploaded user photo as fixed background for hero section with dark overlay for text readability
Ensure project subdomain uses 'mhs-online-earn-platform' (no special characters like ★)
Registration backend must be fully functional with working 'Register' button in production
Admin panel at /admin-panel must display login screen and show complete user list after authentication
known_issues: /admin-panel route showing black screen in production - routing not properly configured for live domain

existing_features.title: Create a hero section on the home page displaying 'Total Users' count, 'Always Active' status text, and two call-to-action buttons labeled 'Start from now' and 'Help & Support'
Implement user registration form with fields for Username, WhatsApp Number, Group Number, Email, Password, and an optional Referral Code field
Create user dashboard displaying a section titled '10+ Daily Tasks' with tasks labeled Job 1 through Job 10
Implement referral system that generates a unique referral link for each registered user and displays their referral count and total referral earnings
Create admin panel at route /admin-panel with local authentication using username 'admin' and password 'habibur123' that allows viewing all users, approving pending accounts, and managing tasks
Implement blue and white color theme throughout the application with 100% mobile-responsive layout and a floating WhatsApp contact button
Implement user authentication system with login functionality that allows approved users to access their dashboard

Add a professional navigation menu in the application header with the following items: Home, Job Task, Withdraw, Refer & Earn, Payment Proof, Support. Each menu item should navigate to its respective page/route.
Implement hamburger-style navigation menu for mobile devices. The menu should collapse into a hamburger icon on smaller screens and expand when clicked, maintaining clean mobile-responsive design.

Replace the floating WhatsApp button and all support-related links throughout the application with a Facebook icon linking to https://www.facebook.com/md.habibur.rahman.62356. The Facebook link should open in a new tab.

Create a dedicated 'Job Task' page accessible via the navigation menu. This page should display 10 interactive cards or buttons labeled 'Job 1' through 'Job 10'. When a user clicks any job card, start a 10-second countdown timer and display a 'Task Complete' message when the timer finishes.

Ensure the 'Refer & Earn' navigation menu item leads to a dedicated page that displays the user's unique referral link and their total referral count. This page should be easily accessible from the main navigation.

Verify that the /admin-panel route remains accessible using local authentication with username 'admin' and password 'habibur123' without requiring Internet Identity authentication. Admin users should be able to log in directly using these credentials.

Add the uploaded user photo (1770720033234.jpg) to the Home Page hero section, positioned directly below the 'MHS★Online Earn Platform' title. Apply circular styling to the image and optimize dimensions for mobile display (recommend 120x120px to 150x150px).
Remove the existing old-man picture (1770720033234.jpg) from the Home page hero section entirely
Set the uploaded user photo (1770720033234-1.jpg) as the background image for the Hero Section on the Home page
Apply a dark transparent overlay (rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) or similar) on top of the background image to ensure white text remains clearly readable
Configure the background image with CSS background-attachment: fixed so it stays in place when scrolling the page
Update the page title in frontend/index.html from 'MHS★Online Earn Platform' to 'MHS Online Earn Platform' by removing the star character (★)

Ensure the admin panel at /admin-panel correctly displays the user management table showing all registered users with their profile information (username, email, WhatsApp number, approval status) after successful admin login using the UserManagementTable component

Fix the handleRegister function in frontend/src/pages/Register.tsx so that clicking the Register button successfully creates the user account and displays a 'Registration Successful' message to the user
After successful user registration, automatically redirect the user from the Register page to the /login page
Fix the /admin-panel route configuration to resolve the black screen issue in production deployment at mhs-online-earn-platform.caffeine.xyz
Verify that the admin login functionality works correctly at /admin-panel using the credentials 'admin' and 'habibur123', and successfully redirects to the admin panel dashboard after authentication
Ensure the /admin-panel route is accessible on the live production domain without requiring Internet Identity authentication

new_feature_requests.summary: Hero section with Total Users count, Always Active text, Start from now and Help & Support buttons
User registration form with Username, WhatsApp Number, Group Number, Email, Password, and Referral Code fields
User dashboard with 10+ Daily Tasks section (Job 1 to Job 10)
Referral system with unique referral link generation, referral count display, and earnings tracking
Admin panel at /admin-panel with local login (username: admin, password: habibur123) for viewing users, approving accounts, and managing tasks
Blue and white theme design with 100% mobile-responsive layout and floating WhatsApp button

Implement backend data models and storage for User accounts (with username, WhatsApp number, group number, email, password hash, referral code, approval status), Tasks (with job details and status), and Referral tracking (linking referrer to referred users)
Add professional navigation menu in header with items: Home, Job Task, Withdraw, Refer & Earn, Payment Proof, Support
Replace WhatsApp button/support links with Facebook Profile link using Facebook icon (https://www.facebook.com/md.habibur.rahman.62356)
Create dedicated Job Task page with 10 cards/buttons (Job 1-10), 10-second timer on click, and 'Task Complete' message
Ensure Refer & Earn menu navigates to page displaying user's unique referral link and total referral count
Implement hamburger-style navigation menu for mobile with clean responsive design
Replace old profile photo with user's uploaded photo as hero section or landing page background with dark overlay and fixed positioning

Fix the registration backend in backend/main.mo to ensure user registration completes successfully and stores all user data (username, whatsappNumber, email, password hash, referralCode, approved status, and principal) in the stable users HashMap when the Register button is clicked

Verify that the admin panel login page renders correctly at https://mhs-online-earn-platform.caffeine.xyz/admin-panel and displays the admin login form with username and password fields using the existing local authentication (admin/habibur123) without requiring Internet Identity
Fix handleRegister function to complete user creation, show 'Registration Successful' message, and auto-redirect to /login page after registration

Ensure the user registration backend API in backend/main.mo is fully connected and operational, storing all user registration data (username, whatsappNumber, email, password hash, referralCode, approved status, principal) in the stable users HashMap when registration is submitted
Verify and ensure all backend functions are properly configured to work with the live domain mhs-online-earn-platform.caffeine.xyz
